name: part_001

scenes.description: Pre-show screen displaying handwritten fan messages and a 'Flashpoint' logo, accompanied by upbeat electronic background music.
A commercial for JOYSOUND featuring an anime-style girl in a blue hoodie holding a microphone.

subtitles.original: ATTENTION ご来場のお客様へ 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください 声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english: ATTENTION To visiting guests: Please be aware of flashing lights. Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original: アニメにハマって 歌いたくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: I got hooked on anime, and now I want to sing.

subtitles.original: 推しのシーン見ながらカラオケ歌えるなんて
subtitles.english: Being able to sing karaoke while watching scenes of my fave...
